product_name: Fox Ranger Print Cargo Mountain Bike Shorts - Men's 12" Inseam
long_description: Featuring liner shorts with a chamois, the men's Fox Ranger Print Cargo Mountain Bike Shorts with a 12 in. inseam have what it takes to meet the challenges of all-day trail riding. Durable, 2-way-stretch polyester outer shorts resist abrasion and move with you when you're pedaling hard. Moisture-wicking, removable liner shorts have a cushioning chamois you'll appreciate during long days in the saddle. Flatlock stitching on liner shorts is smooth and promotes a full range of motion; cuff grippers help keep liner legs from creeping up. Traditional zip fly with double-snap closure makes pit stops a snap; waistband adjusts with 2 rip-and-stick tabs on the inside band. Zippered cargo pocket provides secure storage; rip-and-stick closure cargo pocket offers storage and easy access while wearing gloves. Fox Ranger Print Cargo Mountain Bike Shorts have mesh-lined hand pockets to promote ventilation.
short_description: Featuring liner shorts with a chamois, the men's Fox Ranger Print Cargo Mountain Bike Shorts with a 12 in. inseam have what it takes to meet the challenges of all-day trail riding.
